author: andschwa
body: This is required to get PowerShell Profiles working.  It must be able to source the file, and the file must be able to exist in an expected container. VSO create date - 11/3/2015 10:36:00     VSO closed date - 11/5/2015 9:40:00
title: Fill out Platform.NonWindowsGetFolderPath to duplicate functionality of Environment.GetFolderPath
